bibl.title: Callimachean Tradition and the Muse's Hymn to Ceres (Ov. Met. 5.341-661).

bibl.note: Hymning in a Callimachean mode. - Sicily and Henna. - A new papyrus and Calliope's invocation of the Palici [P. Mich. Inv. 3250a verso (= M.-P.3 1937.11; LDAB 6879)]. - Avec résumé en anglais.
